/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.name: Arbitrary file access during archive extraction ("Zip Slip")
/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.description: Extracting files from a malicious ZIP file, or similar type of archive, without validating that the destination file path is within the destination directory can allow an attacker to unexpectedly gain access to resources.
/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.message: Unsanitized archive entry, which may contain '..', is used in a [["file system operation"|"relative:///ZipSlip.js:9:37:9:44"]].
